item.title: Huge tree that needs pollarding, 8th September
item.description:
Large tree at the rear of 180 Elmleaze on council land. This tree needs pollarding etc. as the branches overhang my garage and drive. A sticky resin falls on my car in the summer and when the seeds and leaves fall, the ground gets slippery and the garage gutters get blocked and overflow. (Dangerous situation for two 75 year olds) The road gutters get blocked causing flooding sometimes and the bus's constantly hit the overhanging branches. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmleaze, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
